name: Oiled Orichalcum Rifle Barrel
description: Used to craft Rifles.

name: Maklain's Greatbow
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the famous minstrel, Maklain.</c>

name: Lattice
description: Use to craft Leaf of Kudzu.

name: Invisible Berserker's Mushroom Spore
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Pile of Flax Seeds
description: Ingredient

name: Spirit of the Zap Experiment
description: Salvaged from the Zap Experiment. Used to craft the Perfected Sword.

name: Recipe: Pahua's Guise
description: A recipe to make an ascended medium coat with Trailblazer's (+Toughness, +Condition Damage, +Expertise, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Elder Dragons and Star Navigation Theories Vol. III
Recipe: Pahua's Trailblazer's Inscription
description: A recipe to make an ascended inscription for crafting weapons with Trailblazer's (+Toughness, +Condition Damage, +Expertise, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Recipe: Trailblazer's Pearl Broadsword
description: A recipe to make a Trailblazer's Pearl Broadsword.

name: The Juggernaut Vol. 1
description: Double-click to unlock the first collection in the journey to craft The Colossus, the precursor to the Legendary Hammer, Juggernaut.

name: Commander's Jewelry Recipe Book
description: Double-click to choose a recipe for crafting gear with the Commander's stat combination.

name: Fractal Research Page
description: Double-click to combine 28 Fractal Research Pages into 1 Fractal Journal. Fractal Journals can be sold to vendors or used in fractal backpack collections.

name: Attuned Solaria, Circle of the Sun (Infused)

buff.description:
+13 Condition Damage
+13 Precision
+13 Toughness
+13 Power
+13 Vitality
+13 Healing Power
+13 Ferocity
+5 Agony Resistance

description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Ghostly Spite
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Carved Tear Drop
description: Used to craft The Legend.

name: Improvised Axe Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other axe.

name: Recipe: Tizlak's Musket
description: A recipe to make an ascended rifle with Commander's (+Power, +Precision, +Toughness, and +Concentration) stats.

name: Acrid Jelly
description: Use power from the generators in the Bauxite Alchemicals Lab in Malchor's Leap to combine Acrid Jelly and Corrosive Paste to form a Destructive Substance.

name: Destructive Substance
description: Use the laboratory equipment found in the Thaumanova Reactor Fractal to mix a blend of Destructive Substance and your Searing Concoction to form Ever-Burning Fuel.

name: Itzel Hourglass
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Mushroom King Cache
description: Double-click to gain champion bags, dragonite ore, empyreal fragments, airship parts, a Pact crowbar, a Reclaimed weapon, and other gear.

name: Mini Ghoul Legs
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Oiled Hardened Shoulderguard Panel
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Shoulders.

name: Airship-Grade Axe Gear
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Alchemical Catalyst
description: <c=@flavor>This tube is created from alchemical reactants and provides a violent reaction when mixed correctly with Transcendent Energy.<c>

name: Recipe: Ossa's Visor
description: A recipe to make an ascended heavy helm with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.

name: Star Chart: Hounds of Balthazar
description: Double-click to combine the four human star charts into the Human Constellation Chapter.

name: Recipe: Maklain's Razor
description: A recipe to make an ascended dagger with Minstrel's (+Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Recipe: Ruka's Grips
description: A recipe to make ascended medium gloves with Wanderer's (+Power, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Toughness) stats.

name: Recipe: Wanderer's Pearl Reaver
description: A recipe to make a Wanderer's Pearl Reaver.

name: Recipe: Angchu Metal Breather
description: A recipe to make an ascended heavy breather with Cavalier (+Toughness, +Power, and +Ferocity) stats.

name: Glittering Warhorn Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other warhorn.

name: Carved Beam
description: Used to craft The Legend.

name: Oiled Orichalcum Axe Blade
description: Used to craft Axes.

name: Reed Pipe
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Ley-Line Hammer Core
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Chest of Artistry
description: Contains the Essence of Artistry and recipes for first-tier Zap.

name: Aurillium Node
description: Activates an aurillium node in your home instance.

name: Waterlogged Note
description: The paper of this note has almost completely disintegrated from being underwater so long, but you are able to make out two numbers, 7 and 2. The numbers look like they were part of an addendum written by a second hand.

name: Attuned Ralena's Band
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Spirit of the Storm Experiment
description: Salvaged from the Storm Experiment. Used to craft the Perfected Scepter.

name: Mordrem Dolyak Finisher
description: Summon the Mordrem dolyak to finish off your foes!

name: Viper's Orichalcum Imbued Inscription
description: Used in the crafting of weapons with +Condition Damage, +Power, +Expertise, and +Precision.

name: Daredevil's Auric Sharpening Stone
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Flame Effigy Embers
description: Use the Searing Cauldron near Ironhead Lake in Iron Marches to combine the Wyvern's Liquid Fire, Elemental Flames, Destroyer's Heat, a Flame Effigy Embers, and a Fire Imbued Heart to create the Ultra Hot Sphere.

name: Recipe: Vigilant Draconic Helm
description: A recipe to make a Vigilant Draconic Helm.

name: Thaumanova Fractal Field Research Paper
description: Complete Daily Recommended Fractals to obtain Fractal Research Pages. Combine the pages into a completed journal and exchange it for a Thaumonova Fractal Research Paper from the Thaumanova Field Researcher located at the end of the Thaumanova Reactor fractal.

name: Auric Torch Shielding
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Vial of Potent Hylek Poison
description: Double-click to coat your weapon in your hylek poison so that you may use it to poison the Master Alchemist and prove your poison-making ability.

name: Recipe: Zintl Cloth Breather
description: A recipe to make an ascended light breather with Shaman (+Vitality, +Condition Damage, and +Healing Power) stats.

name: Memory of the Ages
description: Double-click to combine the Echo of the Foefire, Memory of the Ages, Whisper of Jade Wind, and Tomb of the Primeval Kings Fragment to create the Energy of the Mists.

name: Bloodsucker Enzymes
description: Double-click to combine the Volatile Spores, Bloodsucker Enzymes, Beetle Juice, Frothy Troll Saliva, Malodorous Mucus, and Salivary Stone in an Empty Hylek Flask to create the Concentrated Maguuma Bacteria.

name: Yassith's Viper's Inscription
description: Used in the crafting of weapons with +Condition Damage, +Power, +Expertise, and +Precision.

name: Recipe: Svaard's Leggings
description: A recipe to make ascended medium leggings with Marauder (+Power, +Precision, +Vitality, and +Ferocity) stats.

name: Ventry Bay Talisman
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Oiled Gossamer Epaulet Panel
description: Used to craft Gossamer Shoulders.

name: Box of Recipes: The Hunter
description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft The Hunter.

name: Priory Grymm Svaard
description: Consume to unlock this unique Mist Champion skin on your account.

name: Recipe: Pahua's Brazier
description: A recipe to make an ascended torch with Trailblazer's (+Toughness, +Condition Damage, +Expertise, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Wyvern Cache
description:
Double-click to open.
Contains loot from creatures.
<c=@reminder>Affected by magic-find bonuses.</c>

name: Recipe: Verata's Leather Breather
description: A recipe to make an ascended medium breather with Sinister (+Condition Damage, +Power, and +Precision) stats.

name: Glittering Short Bow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other short bow.

name: Chest of the Krait
description: Contains the Essence of the Krait and recipes for completing Venom.

name: Recipe: Pahua's Trailblazer's Insignia
description: A recipe to make an ascended insignia for crafting armor with Trailblazer's (+Toughness, +Condition Damage, +Expertise, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Half-Eaten Backpack
description: Double-click to open.

description: Use power from the generators in the Bauxite Alchemicals Lab in Malchor's Leap to combine Acrid Jelly and Corrosive Paste to form a Destructive Substance.

name: Journeyman's Ink Set
description: Created with crystal bottles and pigments.

name: Bat Guano
description: Use the guano to fertilize your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.

name: Expertise in Runed Staff Crafting
description:
Use this expertise to craft a second-tier precursor.

description:
Use this expertise to craft a second-tier precursor.
